effect.en: This attack does 20 damage for each Fighting Pokémon in your discard pile.
effect.fr: Cette attaque inflige 20 dégâts pour chaque Pokémon Fighting dans votre pile de défausse.
effect.es: Este ataque hace 20 puntos de daño por cada Pokémon Fighting en tu pila de descartes.
effect.it: Questo attacco infligge 20 danni per ogni Pokémon Fighting nella tua pila degli scarti.
effect.pt: This attack does 20 damage for each Fighting Pokémon in your discard pile.
effect.de: Diese Attacke fügt für jedes Fighting-Pokémon in deinem Ablagestapel 20 Schadenspunkte zu.

effect.en: This Pokémon also does 50 damage to itself.
effect.es: Este Pokémon también se hace 50 puntos de daño a sí mismo.
effect.it: Questo Pokémon infligge anche 50 danni a se stesso.
effect.pt: This Pokémon also does 50 damage to itself.
effect.de: Dieses Pokémon fügt auch sich selbst 50 Schadenspunkte zu.

description.en: It quickly swings its four arms to rock its opponents with ceaseless punches and chops from all angles.
